name: The Last Egg
description:
The Last Egg

Once upon a time, nestled high upon the green hills of Sombrelay Ridge, there lived an egg. And then, he embarked on a remarkable journey. Aid him and see to it that his destiny is fulfilled.

Immerse yourself in an annoyingly-difficult, keyboard-smashing sidescroller. If you like to take challenges and complete very hard games, then this is, without a doubt, the perfect type!

P.S : Try not to punch your monitor out of frustration.
